patterns: what services are there?
what services do you provide
what are the services here
tell me the services there
responses:
Here are the services we have:
1. Car Wash
Description: A professional cleaning service for vehicles, including exterior washing, interior vacuuming, and detailing.

2. Oil Change
Description: Replacement of engine oil and oil filter to maintain vehicle performance and longevity.

3. Tire Replacement & Repair
Description: Services for fixing punctured tires, replacing worn-out tires, and balancing for optimal driving performance.

4. Battery Replacement
Description: Checking battery health and replacing dead or weak vehicle batteries with new ones.

5. Roadside Assistance
Description: Emergency service for jump-starting a dead battery, towing, fuel delivery, or helping with a flat tire.

6. Brake Inspection & Repair
Description: Examination of brake pads, discs, and fluid levels to ensure safe braking performance.

7. Car Diagnostic Service
Description: A full system check-up using diagnostic tools to detect engine, transmission, or electrical issues.

8. Air Conditioning Repair & Recharge
Description: Inspection and recharging of the vehicle’s air conditioning system to maintain cooling efficiency.

9. Engine Tune-Up
Description: Maintenance of the engine by adjusting or replacing spark plugs, filters, and timing belts for better performance.

10. Windshield Repair & Replacement
Description: Fixing small cracks or replacing the entire windshield if necessary for clear visibility.

11. Tow Truck Service
Description: Vehicle towing assistance for breakdowns, accidents, or illegal parking situations. A tow truck will be dispatched to transport the vehicle to a repair shop or another desired location.
Feel free to order the one that solves your problem!

patterns: My steering wheel is hard to turn
The steering feels stiff
I struggle to turn the wheel
responses: A stiff steering wheel can be caused by low power steering fluid, a failing power steering pump, or issues with the steering rack. A Car Diagnostic Service can identify the problem.

patterns: My steering wheel shakes while driving
The wheel vibrates when I turn
I feel a wobble in the steering
responses: A vibrating steering wheel could be due to unbalanced tires, worn-out suspension components, or issues with the power steering system. A Tire Replacement & Repair or Car Diagnostic Service can help.

patterns: I hear a squeaking noise when I turn the wheel
My steering makes a whining sound
There’s a clunking noise when turning
responses: Unusual noises when turning the steering wheel may indicate a low power steering fluid level, a worn-out steering belt, or faulty suspension parts. A Car Diagnostic Service is recommended.

patterns: My car drifts to one side
The steering pulls to the left or right
I have to constantly correct the steering
responses: If your car pulls to one side, it could be due to improper wheel alignment, uneven tire pressure, or brake issues. A Tire Replacement & Repair or Brake Inspection & Repair service can help.

patterns: My steering wheel feels too loose
There’s too much play in the steering
The steering is unresponsive
responses: A loose or unresponsive steering wheel may indicate worn-out tie rods, steering column issues, or a failing steering rack. A Car Diagnostic Service is recommended.

patterns: I see fluid leaking near the front wheels
My power steering fluid is low
There’s a reddish fluid under my car
responses: A power steering fluid leak can cause steering problems and should be fixed as soon as possible. A Car Diagnostic Service can locate and repair the leak.

patterns: Can brake pads make a squeaking noise?

responses: Moisture on your brake rotors can cause temporary squeaking, especially in the morning or after rain. This noise usually disappears after a few stops. If it persists, consider a Brake Inspection & Repair service.

responses: Overheated brakes can cause the pads and rotors to glaze over, leading to squeaking or reduced braking performance. Resurfacing or replacing the brake components may be needed. You may need a Brake Inspection & Repair service.
